original_title: Curious George Goes to The Doctor
overview: Everyone's favorite monkey is back with all-new shows from his Daytime Emmy-nominated hit PBS KIDS TV series. Curious George is curious about things happening all around him and sometimes he just has to get in and try it for himself! Including 8 plus fun-filled games and activities, you'll never be without a friend when Curious George Goes to the Doctor and Lends a Helping Hand!
title: Curious George Goes to The Doctor
